A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Horrible movie. Middle finger shown to all SW fans\, actors\, JJ Abrams and characters. The only 1 star for actors (especially Mark Hamill). They were good. One nice scene on the soil planet. The rest is absolutely terrible. Director doesn't deserve for such movies. He ended history of main characters without any respect to them. Since I loved TFA or R1 (one of the best SW films ever) I hate \"The Last Jedi\".
